6.60: Reduced base attack time from 1.77 to 1.7. Increased  strength gain from 1.8 to 2.3.  Wave of Terrornow deals 25/50/75/100 magical damage. Increased 16px File:Ve n Aura icon.pngFile:Ve n Aura icon.pngAura radius from 450 to 900. Added  Aghanim's Scepter upgrade for Vengeful Spirit: Reduces  Nether Swap cooldown from 45 to 10.
6.67: Wave of Terror Reduced damage from 25/50/75/100 to 18.75/37.5/56.25/75. Changed damage type from magical to HP removal.
6.69: Reduced  Magic Missile stun duration from 1.75 to 1.45/1.55/1.65/1.75.
6.04: Replaced Disentangle with Terror. Increased radius from 500 to 700. Increased armor reduction from 2/3/4/5 to 2/3/4/6. Now recquires level 3/6/9/12 to be leveled, instead of 1/3/5/7.
6.83b: Increased  Magic Missile cooldown from 10 to 13/12/11/10.
6.83c: Reduced  Wave of Terror duration from 20 to 15.
5.53: Can no longer buy  Blink Dagger.
6.02: Fixed  Nether Swap not going on cooldown when used.
6.57: Increased  Vengeance Aura radius from 300 to 450.
6.18: Terror Reduced armor reduction from 2/3/4/6 to 2/3/4/5. Reduced level requirement from 3/6/9/12 to 1/5/7/9.
6.79: Wave of Terror no longer ignores its cast backswing. Can now buy  Blink Dagger. Units now gain 5 seconds free pathing when moved on unpathable ledges with  Nether Swap.
6.78: Increased base  strength and gain from 16 + 2.3 to 18 + 2.6. Increased  Nether Swap cast range from 600/900/1200 to 650/925/1200.
6.17: Reduced  agility gain from 2.65 to 2.35. Reduced movement speed from 300 to 295.
6.77: Increased  Wave of Terror damage from 18.75/37.5/56.25/75 to 30/50/70/90.
6.71: Wave of Terror no longer reduces attack damage by 5%/10%/15%/20%.
6.72: Aghanim's Scepter upgraded  Nether Swap can now target creeps.
6.58: Replaced Terror with  Wave of Terror.
6.80: Increased  Wave of Terror armor reduction from 2/3/4/5 to 3/4/5/6.
6.81: When Vengeful Spirit is killed,  Vengeance Aura now inflicts her killer with a negative Vengeance Aura, which decreases the attack damage of the killer and its allies by the same values as the positive aura, within a 900 radius around the killer.
6.82: Increased  Nether Swap cast range from 650/925/1200 to 700/950/1200.
6.83: Increased  Wave of Terror cooldown from 15 to 20.
6.27: Nether Swap now destroys trees 300 radius around Vengeful Spirit and the target upon cast.
6.20: Nether Swap can no longer be cast on any non-hero unit.
